data.eml:eml: Revision of the Apocephalus mucronatus group of ant decapitating flies (Diptera: Phoridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Brown, Brian V. (2012): Revision of the Apocephalus mucronatus group of ant decapitating flies (Diptera: Phoridae). Zootaxa 3413: 19-28, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.281916
